subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of Marwar?
question_hi: मर्वार के प्राकृतिक बनेंग कौन थे?
explanation_en: Bappa Rawal was the founder of Marwar. Marwar is now known as Jodhpur.
explanation_hi: Bappa Rawal Marwar के प्राकृतिक बनेंग कोणती है जो अब जोड़ी है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the commander in chief of Maharana Pratap's army?
explanation_en: Sirhind Rana, also known as Rana Pratap Singh, was the commander in chief of Maharana Pratap's army. He is popularly known as the hero of the epic Chittorgarh battle.
explanation_ar: Sirhind Rana, المعروف أيضا باسم رانا پراتپ Singh, كان قائد الجيش الرئيسي لـ Maharana Pratap. هو معروف بشكل مشهور كمحارب معركة شيتورجاره.
